name: 行銷管理
restrict: ◎必須先修過【BAU0048  企業管理概論】
description: 本課程的內容主要介紹行銷學的基本概念與行銷實務中的現代行銷議題。課程的內容依循現代行銷學之既定架構,介紹行銷策略規劃、消費者行為，行銷研究，行銷組合等。本課程的設計目的,在浴室的初次接觸行銷學的學生能夠掌握行銷的原理原則, 並對此學科產生進一步了解與學習的興趣。
goals: 了解行銷學的基本知識
擴充對行銷管理實務的瞭解
培養對於行銷學的興趣
syllabus:
Week 1. 課程介紹

Week 2. Chapter 1 Define Marketing for the 21st Century

Week 3. Chapter 1 Define Marketing for the 21st Century

              Chapter 3 Gathering Information and Scanning the Environment

Week 4. Chapter 2 Developing Marketing Strategies and Plans

Week 5. Chapter 6 Analyzing Consumer Markets

Week 6. Chapter 6 Analyzing Consumer Markets

Week 7. Chapter 8 Identifying Market Segments and Targets

Week 8. Chapter 10 Crafting the Brand Positioning (Developing and Communicating a Positioning Strategy)

Week 9. 期中考

Week 10.Chapter 12 Setting Product Strategy

Week 11.Chapter 9 Creating Brand Equity

Week 12.Chapter 13 Designing and Managing Services

Week 13.企業參訪

Week 14.Chapter 14 Developing Pricing Strategies and Programs

Week 15.Chapter 15 Designing and Managing Marketing Channels and Value Networks

Week 16.Chapter 17 Designing and Managing Integrated Marketing Communications

Week 17.Chapter 18 Managing Mass Communications: Advertising, Sales Promotion, Events and Public Relations

Week 18. 期末考

methodologies.note: 涵蓋教科書內容重要專業主題
經由小組討論完成個案及專題報告
於學期中參訪一家行銷管理卓著之企業

grading.note: 2-1具備溝通、協調與談判的能力

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【BAU0048  企業管理概論】
